pkgAnalytics

Class AnalyticsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgAnalytics.AnalyticsController

  • public class AnalyticsController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class AnalyticsController. Assigns 2 pie charts to actions and update labels on the mouse click with extra info

      • ReviewAction

        private void ReviewAction(ActionEvent event)
        Review action. Updates the view of the Pie CHarts. Outputs the information to the user if its not enough data in the database to perform the analysis
        Parameters:
        event - on the button click

      • FoodAnalysis

        private void FoodAnalysis()
        Food analysis. Creates a PieChart and links it to the database values with clickable fields for extra info.
